longDescription: Samsung Electronics is a company engaged in the manufacture and distribution of electronic products. It operates its business through three segments. The Consumer Electronics segment is mainly engaged in the manufacture of color televisions, monitors, printers, air conditioners, refrigerators, laundry machines, and others. The Information Technology and Mobile Communications segment offers computers, handhold phones, network systems, and digital cameras. The Device Solutions segment deals with the manufacture of semiconductor and display parts, including dynamic random access memories (DRAMs), flashes, thin-film transistor-liquid crystal displays, etc.
shortDescription: Samsung Electronics is a company engaged in the manufacture and distribution of electronic products.

longDescription: The Walt Disney Company is an entertainment company. The Company operates in five segments. The Media Networks segment operates broadcast and cable television networks, domestic television stations, radio networks and stations. The Parks and Resorts segment owns and operates the Walt Disney World Resort in Florida that includes theme parks, hotels, vacation club properties, retail, dining, and entertainment complex and other recreational facilities. The Studio Entertainment segment produces and acquires live-action and animated motion pictures, direct-to-video content, musical recordings and live stage plays. The Consumer Products segment licenses trade names, characters, and visual and literary properties, publishes entertainment and educational books, magazines, comic books, and operates English language learning centers. The Interactive segment creates and delivers entertainment and lifestyle content across interactive media platforms.
shortDescription: The Walt Disney Company is a media and entertainment enterprise comprising of studios, parks, products and media networks.

longDescription: Macy's is a retail company that sells apparel, accessories, cosmetics, home furnishings, and other consumer goods. The company operates department and specialty stores, websites, and mobile applications under three brands: Macy's, Bloomingdale's, and bluemercury.
shortDescription: Macy's is a retail company that sells apparel, accessories, cosmetics, home furnishings, and other consumer goods.

longDescription: Etsy is an e-commerce company developing a smartphone application for buying and selling handmade and vintage items, unique factory-manufactured items. The items cover a range, including art, photography, clothing, jewelry, food, bath and beauty products, quilts, knick-knacks and toys, beads, wire, and jewelry-making tools.
shortDescription: Etsy is an e-commerce company developing a smartphone application for buying and selling handmade and vintage items.

longDescription: Tesco is a grocery and general merchandise retailer. The company is active in areas such as retailing of books, clothing, electronics, furniture, toys, petrol, and software, financial services, telecoms and internet services. Tesco also provides retail banking and insurance services.
shortDescription: Tesco is a grocery and general merchandise retailer, providing retail banking and insurance services.

longDescription: Ocado is an online grocery retailer. The Company offers organic groceries, toiletries, beauty and baby products, pet food products, and household goods under Ocado, fetch, SIZZLE, and Waitrose brands. It also engages in the development and monetization of intellectual property and technology used for the online retailing, logistics, and distribution of grocery and consumer goods. In addition, Ocado is involved in the insurance business.
shortDescription: Ocado is an online grocery retailer.

longDescription: Gap is an apparel retail company that offers clothing, accessories, and personal care products for men, women, and children. Its products include denim, tees, button-downs, khakis, and other products, as well as fitness and lifestyle products for use in yoga, training, sports, travel, and everyday activities to women and girls. The company offers its products through company-operated stores, franchise stores, web-sites, third-party arrangements, and catalogs.
shortDescription: Gap is a retailer offering clothing, accessories, and personal care products for men, women, and children.

longDescription: Target operates as a general merchandise retailer. The company offers food assortment, including perishables, dry grocery, dairy, and frozen items. It also provides beauty and household essentials, including beauty products, personal and baby care products, cleaning products, paper products, and pet supplies. Target also distributes apparel for women, men, children, intimate apparel, jewelry, accessories, and shoes, as well as home furnishings and decor comprising furniture.
shortDescription: Target operates as a general merchandise retailer.

longDescription: Starbucks is a chain of restaurants that retails handcrafted coffee, tea, and fresh food items. Its locations serve hot and cold drinks, whole-bean coffee, microground instant coffee, espresso, caffe latte, full-leaf teas, evolution fresh juices, pastries, and snacks.  In addition to its Starbucks Coffee brand, the Company sells goods and services under various brands, including Teavana, Tazo, Seattle's Best Coffee, Evolution Fresh, La Boulange and Ethos.
shortDescription: Starbucks is a chain of restaurants that retails handcrafted coffee, tea, and fresh food items.

longDescription: Amazon is a company operating a marketplace for consumers, sellers, and content creators. It offers merchandise and content purchased for resale from vendors and those offered by third-party sellers. The company also enables authors, musicians, filmmakers, app developers, and others to publish and sell content via its branded websites. Amazon also provides Kindle Direct Publishing, an online platform that allows independent authors and publishers to make their books available in the Kindle Store. In addition, the Company offers co-branded credit card agreements and advertising services, serves developers and enterprises through Amazon Web Services, and manufactures and sells electronic devices. Currently, Amazon operates in three segments: North America, International, and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
shortDescription: Amazon is an ecommerce and cloud computing company.

longDescription: Reckitt Benckiser is a consumer goods company, providing health, hygiene and home products. The Company is engaged in delivering solutions in household cleaning and health and personal care to consumers. Its brands include the antiseptic brand Dettol, the sore throat medicine Strepsils, the hair removal brand Veet, the immune support supplement Airborne, the air freshener Air Wick, Calgon, Clearasil, Cillit Bang, Durex, Lysol, Mycil and Vanish.
shortDescription: Reckitt Benckiser is a consumer goods company, providing health, hygiene and home products.

longDescription: Costco Wholesale Corporation operates membership warehouses. The Company offers branded and private-label products in a range of merchandise categories. It provides dry and packaged foods, groceries, snack foods, candies, bakery, meat, alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages, cleaning supplies, appliances, electronics, health and beauty aids, hardware, garden and patio products, apparel, and small appliances. Costco Wholesale Corporation also operates gas stations, pharmacies, optical dispensing centers, food courts, hearing-aid centers, and is engaged in the travel business.
shortDescription: Costco Wholesale Corporation operates membership warehouses.

longDescription: Walmart is a retailing corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Its operations are organized into four divisions: Walmart U.S., Walmart International, Sam's Club, and Global eCommerce. The company offers various retail formats, including supercenters, supermarkets, hypermarkets, warehouse clubs, cash-and-carry stores, home improvement, specialty electronics, restaurants, apparel stores, drugstores, convenience stores, and digital retail. It offers a selection of consumer products, as well as photo, financial, wireless, and pharmacy services.
shortDescription: Walmart is a retailing corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores.

longDescription: Kroger produces and processes food products for sale in supermarkets. The Company operates supermarkets, multi-department stores, jewelry stores, and convenience stores. Its food and drug stores offer natural food and organic sections, pharmacies, general merchandise, pet centers, fresh seafood, and organic produce. Multi-department stores provide general merchandise items, such as apparel, home fashion and furnishings, outdoor living, electronics, automotive products, toys, and fine jewelry. Price impact warehouse stores offer grocery, health and beauty care items, as well as meat, dairy, baked goods, and fresh produce items.
shortDescription: Kroger manufactures and processes food products for sale in supermarkets.

longDescription: Marks & Spencer is a multinational retailer, which operates various retail stores. The Company is engaged in delivering brand food, clothing, and home products. It sells womenswear, lingerie, menswear, kidswear, beauty, and home products, serving customers through full-line stores and online.
shortDescription: Marks & Spencer is a multinational retailer, which operates various retail stores.

longDescription: Procter & Gamble is a multinational consumer goods company offering personal care products, pet food, cleaning agents and more. It primarily specializes in a wide range of cleaning agents, personal care and hygienic products. The Company structure is categorized into ten categories, including baby care, fabric care, family care, feminine care, grooming, hair care, home care, oral care, personal health care, and skin and personal care. Its products are sold primarily through mass merchandisers, grocery stores, membership club stores, drug stores, department stores, distributors, baby stores, specialty beauty stores, e-commerce, high-frequency stores, and pharmacies.
shortDescription: Procter & Gamble is a multinational consumer goods company offering personal care products, pet food, cleaning agents and more.

longDescription: Wayfair is an online retailer of home products for bedrooms, living rooms, kitchen and dining, home entertainment, bathrooms and more. The Company offers browsing, merchandising and product discovery for a range of products from various suppliers. It operates through two segments: U.S. and International. Wayfair provides its clients with numerous products for the home sector under various brands. It offers a selection of furniture, decor, decorative accent, housewares, seasonal decor, and other home goods through its sites, such as Wayfair, Joss & Main, AllModern, DwellStudio, and Birch Lane.
shortDescription: Wayfair is an online retailer of home products for bedrooms, living rooms, kitchen and dining, home entertainment, bathrooms and more.

longDescription: Sainsbury's engages in the food, general merchandise and clothing retailing, and financial services activities. It operates through four segments: Food;  General Merchandise and Clothing; Financial Services; and Property Investment. The Company is also involved in an online grocery and general merchandise operations, and provides home, clothing, technology, leisure, toy, and electrical products, as well as groceries and loyalty programs, and energy solutions. In addition, it invests in and develops real estate properties; and offers financial services, such as credit cards, savings, and personal loans, as well as travel money, mortgages, and car, home, pet, travel, and life insurance.
shortDescription: Sainsbury's engages in the food, general merchandise and clothing retailing, and financial services activities.

longDescription: Casey’s General Stores, together with its subsidiaries, operates convenience stores under the Casey’s General Store name. The Company’s stores provide a selection of food, including freshly prepared foods, beverage and tobacco products, health and beauty aids, automotive products and other nonfood items. Its stores also offer fuel for sale on a self-service basis.
shortDescription: Casey's General Stores is a chain of convenience stores.

longDescription: Sysco is a multinational corporation that markets and distributes a range of food and related products primarily to the foodservice or food-away-from-home industry. It operates through three segments: U.S. Foodservice Operations, International Foodservice Operations, and SYGMA. The Company distributes frozen foods, canned and dry foods, fresh meats and seafood, dairy products, beverage products, imported specialties, and fresh produce. It also supplies various non-food items, including paper products, tableware, cookware, restaurant and kitchen equipment and supplies, and cleaning supplies.
shortDescription: Sysco is a multinational corporation that markets and distributes a range of food and related products primarily to the foodservice or food-away-from-home industry.

longDescription:
Tiffany & Company is an American multinational luxury jewelry and specialty retailer.

Tiffany designs, manufactures, and sells jewelry, watches, and crystal glassware. It also sells other timepieces, sterling silverware, china, stationery, fragrances, and accessories. Tiffany sells its goods exclusively through 275 Tiffany & Co. stores and boutiques worldwide, its website, direct-mail, corporate merchandising, business-to-business accounts, and catalogs.
shortDescription: Tiffany & Company is an American multinational luxury jewelry and specialty retailer.

longDescription: Nike designs, develops, and markets footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessory products. The company offers various categories of shoes including running, training, basketball, soccer, sport-inspired urban shoes, and kids' shoes. In addition, it offers sports-inspired lifestyle apparel, athletic bags, and accessory items. Nike also provides a line of performance equipment and various types of equipment designed for sports activities under its brand name, as well as markets apparel with licensed college and professional team and league logos. It also offers licenses to produce and sell Nike brand swimwear, children's apparel, training equipment, eyewear, electronic devices, and golf accessories.
shortDescription: Nike designs, develops and markets footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessory products.

longDescription: 3D Systems engineers, manufactures and sells 3D printers. The company creates product concept models, precision and functional prototypes, master patterns for tooling, as well as production parts for direct digital manufacturing. 3D Systems uses proprietary processes to fabricate physical objects using input from computer-aided design and manufacturing software, or 3D scanning and 3D sculpting devices. Its technologies and services are used in the design, development and production stages of many industries, including aerospace, automotive, healthcare, dental, entertainment, and durable goods.
shortDescription: 3D Systems is a global provider of 3D content-to-print solutions.

longDescription: Cintas Corporation provides corporate identity uniforms and related business services. The company designs, manufactures and implements corporate identity uniform programs, and provides entrance mats, restroom cleaning and supplies, tile and carpet cleaning, promotional products, first aid, safety, fire protection products and services, and industrial carpet and tile cleaning.
shortDescription: Cintas Corporation provides corporate identity uniforms and related business services.

longDescription: Colgate-Palmolive is a consumer products company. It produces and distributes household, healthcare, and personal care products. The Company manufactures and markets oral care, personal and home care, and pet nutrition products under different brand names, including Colgate, Palmolive, Speed Stick, Lady Speed Stick.
shortDescription: Colgate-Palmolive is a consumer products company that produces and distributes household, healthcare, and personal care products.

longDescription: Coca-Cola European Partners produces, distributes, and markets a range of nonalcoholic ready-to-drink beverages. The Company offers water, juice, isotonic, sparkling flavor and energy drink, and other products. It provides its products primarily under the Coca-Cola, Fanta, and Monster brands, as well as Coca-Cola Zero Sugar, Vio, Royal Bliss, Honest, and Glaceau Smartwater brands.
shortDescription: Coca-Cola European Partners produces, distributes, and markets a range of nonalcoholic ready-to-drink beverages.

longDescription: Clorox is a multinational manufacturer and marketer of consumer and professional products. The Company offers consumer brand names, including its namesake bleach and cleaning products, Pine-Sol cleaners, Liquid-Plumr clog removers, Poett home care products, Fresh Step cat litter, Glad bags, wraps and container products, Kingsford and Match Lightvu charcoal, RenewLife digestive health products, Hidden Valley dressings and sauces, Brita water-filtration products and Burt’s Bees natural personal care products. It also markets to professional services channels, including infection control products for the healthcare industry with the Clorox Healthcare brand and Clorox Commercial Solutions brand.
shortDescription: Clorox manufactures and markets consumer and professional products worldwide.

longDescription: Burlington Stores operates as a retailer of branded apparel products. The Company offers fashion-focused merchandise, including women's ready-to-wear apparel, accessories, footwear, menswear, youth apparel, coats, and gifts, as well as baby, home, and beauty products.
shortDescription: Burlington Stores operates as a retailer of branded apparel products.

longDescription: Johnson & Johnson engages in the research and development, manufacture and sale of a range of products in the healthcare field. The Company is organized into three business segments: Consumer, Pharmaceutical and Medical Devices. The Consumer segment includes a broad range of products used in the baby care, oral care, beauty, over-the-counter pharmaceutical, women’s health, and wound care markets. The Pharmaceutical segment is focused on five therapeutic areas: immunology, infectious diseases and vaccines, neuroscience, oncology, and cardiovascular and metabolic diseases. The Medical Devices segment includes a broad range of products used in the orthopedic, surgery, cardiovascular, diabetes care and vision care fields.
shortDescription: Johnson & Johnson engages in the research and development, manufacture and sale of a range of products in the healthcare field.

longDescription: Best Buy is a company operating as a retailer of technology and entertainment products and services. The company operates in two segments: Domestic and International. It offers software and virtual reality products and a range of appliances, such as TV sets, home theaters, cameras, cell phones, audio products, electronics, etc.
shortDescription: Best Buy is a company operating as a retailer of technology and entertainment products and services.

longDescription: Dollar General Corporation is a small-box discount retailer. The Corporation offers an assortment of the most popular brands at low everyday prices in small, convenient locations.
shortDescription: Dollar General Corporation is a small-box discount retailer.

longDescription: Debenhams is a multinational retailer operating under a department store format with franchise stores in other countries. The Company sells a range of men's, women's, and children's clothing, cosmetics, household items and furniture, bicycles, luggage, garden products, flowers, and giftware.
shortDescription: Debenhams is a multinational retailer operating under a department store format with franchise stores in other countries.

longDescription: Conn’s is a consumer goods retailer. The Company operates more than 100 retail locations in Arizona, Colorado, Louisiana, Mississippi, Nevada, New Mexico, North Carolina, Oklahoma, South Carolina, Tennessee, and Texas. Products and services offered through the Company's retail sales outlets and distribution and service facilities include furniture and mattresses, home appliances, consumer electronics, home office equipment, repair service agreements, credit insurance, home delivery, product repair service and consumer credit to an under served segment of the population.
shortDescription: Conn’s is a consumer goods retailer.

longDescription: Office Depot is a provider of business services and supplies, products and technology solutions to small, medium and enterprise businesses. The company operates through a fully integrated B2B distribution platform of retail stores, online presence, and sales professionals and technicians. Its product offerings include paper, writing instruments, office supplies, and cleaning and breakroom supplies, as well as toner and ink, printers, computers, tablets and accessories, electronic storage, and furniture, such as desks, seating, and luggage. Office Depot provides a wide range of technology services, including end-user computing support, managed IT services, data center monitoring and management, service desk, network infrastructure, IT workforce solutions, mobile device management, cloud services, and equipment installation and repair. It also offers copy, print, and other services, such as printing of business cards, banners, documents, and promotional products, copying and photo services, managed print and fulfillment services, and product and service subscriptions.
shortDescription: Office Depot is a provider of business services and supplies, products and technology solutions to small, medium and enterprise businesses.

longDescription: British American Tobacco (BTA) is a company providing cigarettes and other tobacco products worldwide. It manufactures vapor and tobacco heating products, oral tobacco and nicotine products, such as snus and moist snuff, cigars, and e-cigarettes. The company offers the products under the Dunhill, Kent, Lucky Strike, Pall Mall, Rothmans, Vogue, Viceroy, Kool, Peter Stuyvesant, and other brands via retail stores.
shortDescription: British American Tobacco (BTA) is a company providing cigarettes and other tobacco products worldwide.

longDescription: Big 5 Sporting Goods is a sporting goods retailer. The Company offers athletic shoes, apparel and accessories, as well as a selection of outdoor and athletic equipment for team sports, fitness, camping, hunting, fishing, tennis, golf, winter and summer recreation, and roller sports. It also provides private label items, such as shoes, apparel, camping equipment, fishing supplies, and snow sports equipment under its own trademarks comprising Golden Bear, Harsh, Pacifica, and Rugged Exposure; and licensed trademarks, including Beach Feet, Bearpaw, Body Glove, Morrow, and The Realm.
shortDescription: Big 5 Sporting Goods operates as a sporting goods retailer.

longDescription: TravelCenters of America operates and franchises travel center, and standalone convenience store and restaurant locations. It operates in two segments, Travel Centers and Convenience Stores. The Company offers diesel fuel and gasoline, and diesel exhaust fluid and operates full service restaurants and quick service restaurants. It also operates truck repair and maintenance facilities that offer oil change, wheel alignment, tire repair, and diesel filter cleaning, as well as air conditioning, brakes, and electrical systems diagnostics and repair services.
shortDescription: TravelCenters of America operates travel centers and convenience stores.

longDescription: Big Lots, through its wholly owned subsidiaries, is a North America's closeout retailer. The Company operates a total of 1,533 stores in two countries: the United States and Canada. The merchandising categories include Consumables, Furniture, Home, Seasonal, Play n' Wear, and Hardlines & Other.
shortDescription: Big Lots is a non-traditional, discount retailer.

longDescription: Five Below operates as a specialty value retailer. It offers accessories, including novelty socks, sunglasses, jewelry, scarves, gloves, hair accessories, athletic tops and bottoms, and T-shirts, as well as beauty products; and items used to complete and personalize living space, including glitter lamps, posters, frames, fleece blankets, plush items, pillows, candles, incense, lighting, novelty décor, and related items. The Company also provides sport balls; team sports merchandise and fitness accessories, such as hand weights, jump ropes, and gym balls; games, including name brand board games, puzzles, collectibles, and toys; and pool, beach and outdoor toys, games, and accessories.
shortDescription: Five Below operates as a specialty value retailer.

longDescription: DICK’S Sporting Goods is an omnichannel sporting goods retailer. It provides a range of sports equipment, apparel, footwear, and accessories. The company offers its products through an e-commerce platform that is integrated with its store network.
shortDescription: DICK’S Sporting Goods is an omnichannel sporting goods retailer.

longDescription: The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells tires and related products and services. The Company offers various lines of rubber tires for automobiles, trucks, buses, aircrafts, motorcycles, earthmoving and mining equipment, farm implements, industrial equipment, and various other applications under the Goodyear, Dunlop, Kelly, Debica, Sava, Fulda, and various other Goodyear owned house brands, as well as under the private-label brands.
shortDescription: The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells tires and related products and services.

longDescription: Sears Hometown and Outlet Stores is a retailer that sells home appliances, lawn and garden equipment, apparel, mattresses, sporting goods and tools. The Company operates through two segments — the Sears Hometown and Hardware segment, which provides in-store and online access to a wide selection of national brands of home appliances, tools, lawn and garden equipment, sporting goods, consumer electronics and household goods, depending on the particular store; and the Sears Outlet segment, which provides customers with in-store and online access to new, one-of-a-kind, out-of-carton, discontinued, obsolete, used, reconditioned, overstocked and scratched and dented products across a broad assortment of merchandise categories.
shortDescription: Sears Hometown and Outlet Stores is a retailer that sells home appliances, lawn and garden equipment, apparel, mattresses, sporting goods and tools.

longDescription: Dollar Tree operates discount variety retail stores. It operates through two segments, Dollar Tree and Family Dollar. The Dollar Tree segment offers merchandise at the fixed price of $1.00. It provides consumable merchandise, including candy and food, health and beauty care products, everyday consumables and seasonal goods, which include Valentine's Day, Easter, Halloween, and Christmas merchandise. The Family Dollar segment operates general merchandise discount retail stores that offer consumable merchandise, which comprise food, tobacco, health and beauty aids, household chemicals, paper products, hardware and automotive supplies, diapers, batteries, pet food and supplies, home products, including housewares, home décor, and giftware, as well as domestics, such as comforters, sheets, and towels.
shortDescription: Dollar Tree operates variety retail stores.

longDescription: Boohoo is an online fashion retailer offering various styles across womenswear and menswear. The Company designs, sources, markets and sells clothing, shoes, accessories and beauty products to a market of 16 to 30-year-old consumers.
shortDescription: Boohoo offers an online store that enables shoppers to choose and buy from a range of clothing, accessories and footwear.

longDescription: Kingfisher is a home improvement retailing company. The Company is engaged in the supply ofDIY and home improvement products and services through a network of retail stores and other channels. Its main retail brands are B&Q, Castorama, Brico Dépôt and Screwfix.
shortDescription: Kingfisher is a home improvement retailing company.

longDescription: Essendant is a company that distributes janitorial and sanitation supplies, breakroom items, foodservice consumables, safety and security items, and paper and packaging supplies. The Company also provides technology products, such as computer accessories, imaging supplies, data storage products, computer hardware, including printers and other peripherals. In addition, it offers traditional office products, including writing instruments, business machines, filing and record storage products, presentation products, shipping and mailing supplies, calendars, and general office accessories; and industrial supplies, such as hand and power tools, safety and security supplies, janitorial equipment, and oilfield and welding supplies, as well as industrial maintenance, repair, and operations items.
shortDescription: Essendant is a company that distributes janitorial and sanitation supplies, breakroom items, foodservice consumables, safety and security items, and paper and packaging supplies.

longDescription: Eastman Kodak Company, commonly known as Kodak, is a global commercial printing and imaging company with technologies in materials science, digital imaging science and software, and deposition processes. It provides hardware, software, consumables, and services to customers in graphic arts, commercial print, publishing, packaging, electronic displays, entertainment and commercial films, and consumer products markets.
shortDescription: Eastman Kodak Company, commonly known as Kodak, is a global commercial printing and imaging company with technologies in materials science, digital imaging science and software, and deposition processes.

longDescription: The Bosch Group is a global supplier of technology and services that operates in four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology. As an IoT company, Bosch offers solutions for smart homes and cities, connected mobility, and connected industry. It uses its expertise in sensor technology, software, and services, as well as its own IoT cloud to offer customers connected, cross-domain solutions from a single source.
shortDescription: The Bosch Group is a global supplier of technology and services that operates in four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology.

longDescription: Bed Bath & Beyond operates a chain of retail stores. The Company sells a range of domestics merchandise and home furnishings. Domestics merchandise includes bed linens and related items, bath items and kitchen textiles. Home furnishings include kitchen and tabletop items, fine tabletop, basic housewares, general home furnishings, consumables and juvenile products. It also offers health and beauty care items, and giftware and household items, as well as infant and toddler merchandise.
shortDescription: Bed Bath & Beyond operates a chain of retail stores selling a range of domestic merchandise and home furnishings.

longDescription: Arcadia Group is a multinational retailing company. It owns, operates and franchises a chain of fashion stores and outlets. The Company offers its products under brands, such as Burton, Dorothy Perkins, Evans, Miss Selfridge, Topshop, Topman, Wallis and Outfit. Arcadia Group operates through retail stores and online.
shortDescription: Arcadia Group is a multinational retailing company.

longDescription: Whirlpool Corporation is a company manufacturing and distributing home appliances. It offers laundry appliances, refrigeration, room air conditioning equipment, cooking appliances, dishwashers, mixers, and other small household appliances. In addition, the Company produces hermetic compressors for refrigeration systems.
shortDescription: Whirlpool Corporation is a company manufacturing and distributing home appliances.

longDescription: Since 1996, Murphy USA has been the place people go to save on the gas that fuels their lives. From the lowest prices on gas to exclusive deals on your family’s favorite snacks and drinks, we’re always going the extra mile to help you buy smarter and drive farther. We do everything in our power - from low Murphy USA gas prices and quality fuels to community service and in-store savings - to be as loyal to our customers as our customers are to us.
shortDescription: Murphy is a low-price, high-volume fuel retailer that also sells convenience merchandise through a chain of retail stores.

longDescription: Walgreens Boots Alliance operates as a pharmacy-led health and wellbeing company. It sells prescription drugs and an assortment of general merchandise, including non-prescription drugs, beauty products, toiletry, photo finishing, seasonal merchandise, greeting cards, and convenience foods through its retail drugstores and care clinics. The company also provides specialty pharmacy and mail services, manages in-store clinics, as well as sells its products online and through a mobile application.
shortDescription: Walgreens Boots Alliance operates as a pharmacy-led health and wellbeing company.

longDescription: RPM International is a company that manufactures, markets and sells various specialty chemical product lines, including specialty paints, protective coatings, roofing systems, sealants and adhesives. It serves mainly the industrial, specialty and consumer markets. The Company operates through three segments. The Industrial segment includes providing of maintenance and protection products for roofing and waterproofing systems, flooring, passive fire protection, corrosion control and other construction chemicals. The Specialty segment specializes in industrial cleaners, restoration services equipment, colorants, exterior finishes, edible coatings and other specialty coatings. The Consumer segment manufactures and markets professional use and do-it-yourself products for a range of consumer applications.
shortDescription: RPM International is a company that manufactures, markets and sells various specialty chemical product lines

longDescription: Kimberly-Clark is a multinational personal care corporation engaged in manufacturing and marketing personal care, consumer tissue, and professional products. The Personal Care segment offers disposable diapers, training and youth pants, swim pants, baby wipes, feminine and incontinence care products, and other related products. The Consumer Tissue segment provides facial and bathroom tissues, paper towels, napkins, etc. The K-C Professional (KCP) segment offers wipers, tissues, towels, apparel, soaps, and sanitizers. Kimberly-Clark markets its products under a number of brands.
shortDescription: Kimberly-Clark is a multinational personal care corporation engaged in manufacturing and marketing personal care, consumer tissue, and professional products.

longDescription: Sleep Number Corporation provides sleep solutions and services. It designs, manufactures, markets, retails and services beds and bedding accessories, such as mattresses, adjustable bases, pillows, sheets, and other bedding products under the Sleep Number and FlextFit brands. The Company sells its products directly to consumers through retail, online and phone, as well as through wholesale.
shortDescription: Sleep Number Corporation is a company that manufactures beds as well as foundations and bedding accessories.

longDescription: Herman Miller is a global provider of interior furnishings and technology solutions for organizations and individuals. The company engages in the research, design, manufacture, and distribution of office furniture systems, seating products, other freestanding furniture elements, textiles, home furnishings, and related services. It also offers modular systems, storage products, ergonomic solutions, data-enabled solutions, and a range of residential, education, and healthcare furniture solutions. The company sells products through multiple distribution channels, including contract furniture dealers, direct contract sales, retail studios, as well as its online stores and global e-commerce platforms.
shortDescription: Herman Miller is a global provider of interior furnishings and related technologies and services for organizations and individuals.

longDescription: Lush is a manufacturer and retailer of fresh handmade cosmetics. The Company produces and distributes creams, soaps, shampoos, shower gels, lotions, moisturizers, scrubs, masks and other cosmetics for the face, hair, and body using only vegetarian or vegan recipes. Lush provides its products through shops, internet, and telephone, as well as partnerships with local franchise holders internationally.
shortDescription: Lush is a manufacturer and retailer of fresh handmade cosmetics.

longDescription: J.M. Smucker manufactures and markets fruit spreads, ice cream toppings, beverages, shortening, peanut butter, and other products. The Company primarily offers coffee, peanut butter, fruit spreads, shortening and oils, baking mixes and ready-to-spread frostings, frozen sandwiches, flour and baking ingredients, juices and beverages, and portion control products. It also provides pet premium products, dog snacks, ice cream toppings, pickles, and canned milk.
shortDescription: J.M. Smucker manufactures and markets fruit spreads, ice cream toppings, beverages, shortening, peanut butter, lubricants, and other products.

longDescription: Mattel is a multinational toy manufacturing company which designs and markets a range of toy products worldwide. The Company offers dolls and accessories, vehicles and play sets, games and puzzles under the Mattel Girls & Boys brands, Fisher-Price and American Girl brands. In addition, it offers construction and arts and crafts brands, as well as publishes the American Girl magazine. Mattel sells its products directly to consumers via its catalog, Website, and proprietary retail stores, as well as directly to retailers and wholesalers, and through agents and distributors.
shortDescription: Mattel is a multinational toy manufacturing company which designs and markets a range of toy products worldwide.

longDescription: Mohawk Industries designs, manufactures and sells flooring products for remodeling and new constructions of residential and commercial spaces worldwide. The Company's Global Ceramic segment provides a range of ceramic tile, porcelain tile, and natural stone products, and sources, markets, and distributes other tile related products. Its Flooring North America segment offers floor covering product lines in a range of colors, textures, and patterns, including carpets, rugs, carpet padS, hardwood, laminate, luxury vinyl tiles, and sheet vinyl products. The Flooring Rest of the World segment provides laminate, hardwood flooring, and vinyl flooring, as well as roofing elements, insulation boards, medium-density fiberboards, and chipboards products under various brands; and licenses patents related to flooring manufacturers.
shortDescription: Mohawk Industries manufactures and markets flooring products for remodeling and new constructions of residential and commercial spaces.

longDescription: Newell Brands is a company that designs, sources, and distributes consumer and commercial products worldwide. The Company's segments include Writing, Home Solutions, Commercial Products, Baby and Parenting, Branded Consumables, Consumer Solutions, Outdoor Solutions, and Process Solutions. Its products are marketed under various brand names.
shortDescription: Newell Brands is a company that designs, sources, and distributes consumer and commercial products worldwide.

longDescription: Philip Morris International is a multinational cigarette and tobacco manufacturing company. It manufactures and sells cigarettes, other tobacco products, and other nicotine-containing products. The company operates a portfolio of tobacco and cigarette brands.
shortDescription: Philip Morris International is a multinational cigarette and tobacco manufacturing company.

longDescription: Domtar Corporation designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes various communication papers, specialty and packaging papers, and absorbent hygiene products. It operates in two segments: Pulp and Paper, and Personal Care. The Company offers business papers, commercial printing and publishing papers, and base papers that are converted into envelopes, tablets, business forms, and data processing/computer forms. It also provides papers for thermal and flexible packaging, food and medical packaging, medical gowns and drapes, and papers for industrial and specialty applications. Further, the Company offers softwood, fluff, and hardwood Kraft products for various end products. Additionally, it provides absorbent hygiene products for healthcare, retail, and direct-to-consumer channels.
shortDescription: Domtar Corporation designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes various communication papers, specialty and packaging papers, and absorbent hygiene products.

longDescription: Reynolds American manufactures and sells cigarettes and other tobacco products. It operates through RJR Tobacco, Santa Fe, and American Snuff segments. The Company provides cigarettes, snus, moist snuff and other tobacco products under a number of brands. It also manufactures and markets digital vapor cigarettes, and markets nicotine replacement therapy products. It distributes its products primarily through direct wholesale deliveries from a local distribution center and public warehouses.
shortDescription: Reynolds American manufactures and sells cigarettes and other tobacco products.

longDescription: L'Oréal manufactures and sells cosmetic products for women and men worldwide. It operates through four divisions: Consumer Products, L’oréal Luxe, Professional Products, and Active Cosmetics. The Company offers shampoos, hair care products, shower gels, skin care products, cleansers, hair colors, styling products, deodorants, sun care products, make-up, perfumes, etc. L'Oréal provides its products under the L’Oréal Paris, Garnier, Maybelline New York, NYX Professional Makeup, Lancôme, Yves Saint Laurent Beauté, and other brands.
shortDescription: L'Oréal manufactures and sells cosmetic products for women and men worldwide.

longDescription: Staples is an office supply retailing company. It offers business-technology products, facility and breakroom supplies, computers and mobility products, office furniture, and etc. The company also provides print and marketing, as well as technology services.
shortDescription: Staples is an office supply retailing company.

longDescription: Kate Spade is a company that designs and markets accessories and apparel. It operates under two multichannel lifestyle brands: Kate Spade New York and Jack Spade. The company offers clothes, shoes, jewelry, home decor and tech accessories.
shortDescription: Kate Spade is a company that designs and markets accessories and apparel.

longDescription: RTW Retailwinds (formerly New York & Company) is a nationwide specialty retailer of fashionable women's apparel, accessories and beauty. It offers "must-have" trends for every season from wear-to-work collection to casual collection, including cut pants in Petite, Average and Tall, denim, jewelry, accessories, and even City Beauty, and bath and body collection. The Company operates through its stores and website.
shortDescription: RTW Retailwinds (formerly New York & Company) is a nationwide specialty retailer of women's fashion and accessories.

longDescription: Williams-Sonoma operates as a multi-channel specialty retailer of various products for the home. It operates through two segments, E-commerce and Retail. The Company offers cooking, dining, and entertaining products, including cookware, tools, electrics, cutlery, tabletop and bar, outdoor, furniture, cookbooks, as well as home furnishings and decorative accessories. In addition, it offers a range of assortments of lighting, hardware, furniture and home decor.
shortDescription: Williams-Sonoma operates as a multi-channel specialty retailer of various products for the home.

longDescription: Mothercare is a British retailer specializing in products for expectant mothers and in general merchandise for children up to 8 years old. The Company provides clothing for babies, toddlers, girls, and boys; nightwear and underwear, footwear, swimwear, and other accessories, as well as maternity apparel. It also offers home and travel products comprising car seats, buggy and pushchair systems, beddings, soft furnishings and furniture, bathing products, high chairs, feeding products and baby monitors, toys and other products.
shortDescription: Mothercare is a British retailer specializing in products for expectant mothers and in general merchandise for children up to 8 years old.

longDescription: Tapestry (formerly Coach) is a marketer of accessories and gifts for women and men. The company offers a range of modern, fashionable handbags and accessories. Its product offerings include women’s and men’s bags, accessories, footwear, wearables, jewelry, travel bags, sunwear, watches and fragrance. It operates three main brands, including Coach, Kate Spade and Stuart Weitzman.
shortDescription: Tapestry (formerly Coach) is a marketer of accessories and gifts for women and men.

longDescription: Vista Outdoor is a designer, manufacturer, and marketer of outdoor sports and recreation products. It also makes gear for camping, hiking, skiing, and biking such as flashlights, headlamps, lanterns, helmets, goggles, GPS locators, etc.
shortDescription: Vista Outdoor is a designer, manufacturer, and marketer of outdoor sports and recreation products.

longDescription: Advance Auto Parts is an automotive aftermarket parts provider, serving do-it-for-me (Professional) and do-it-yourself (DIY) customers. Its categories of products include Parts and Batteries, Accessories and Chemicals, and Engine Maintenance. The Company's stores and branches offer battery accessories, belts and hoses, brakes and brake pads, chassis and climate control parts, clutches and drive shafts, engines and engine parts, exhaust systems and parts, hub assemblies, ignition components and wires, radiators and cooling parts, starters and alternators, and steering and alignment parts.
shortDescription: Advance Auto Parts is an automotive aftermarket parts provider, serving do-it-for-me (Professional) and do-it-yourself (DIY) customers.

longDescription: Electrolux is a company specializing in home appliances and appliances for professional use. The Company offers refrigerators, ovens, cookers, hobs, dishwashers, washing machines, vacuum cleaners, air conditioners, and small domestic appliances. Its brands include Electrolux, AEG, Zanussi, Frigidaire and Electrolux Grand Cuisine.
shortDescription: Electrolux is a company specializing in home appliances and appliances for professional use.

longDescription: Party City Holdco designs, manufactures, sources, and distributes party supplies. The Company operates in two segments, Retail and Wholesale. It offers paper and plastic tableware, accessories and novelties, metallic and latex balloons, Halloween and other costumes, decorations, and stationery and gift items.
shortDescription: Party City Holdco is a party goods retailer and supplier of decorated party goods.

longDescription: The Container Store Group is a specialty retailer of storage and organization products. The Company operates in two segments, The Container Store and Elfa. Its retail stores provide various lifestyle products, including closets, collections, and hooks, as well as bath, kitchen, laundry, gift packaging, long-term storage, office, shelving, storage, trash, travel, and elfa branded products. The Company also designs, manufactures, and sells component-based shelving and drawer systems that are customizable for any area of the home
shortDescription: The Container Store Group is a specialty retailer of storage and organization products.

longDescription: Tuesday Morning specializes in selling discounted, upscale decorative home accessories, housewares, seasonal goods and famous-maker gifts under such brands as Peacock Alley, Sferra, Lenox, Waterford and Hartmann. The Company offers products in a range of categories, such as home decor, furniture, bed and bath, kitchen, toys, crafts, pets and seasonal goods.
shortDescription: Tuesday Morning specializes in selling discounted, upscale decorative home accessories, housewares, seasonal goods and famous-maker gifts.

longDescription: Sportsman's Warehouse is an outdoor sporting goods retailer. The Company offers camping products, such as backpacks, camp essentials, canoes and kayaks, coolers, outdoor cooking equipment, sleeping bags, tents, and tools; and clothing products, including camouflage, jackets, hats, outerwear, sportswear, technical gear, and work wear. It also provides fishing products comprising bait, electronics, fishing rods, flotation items, fly fishing products, lines, lures, reels, tackles, and small boats; and foot wear products consisting of hiking and work boots, socks, sport sandals, technical footwear, trial and casual shoes, and waders. In addition, Sportsman's Warehouse offers hunting and shooting products.
shortDescription: Sportsman's Warehouse is an outdoor sporting goods retailer.

longDescription: Cabela's is an omnichannel retailer of hunting, fishing, camping, shooting sports and related outdoor merchandise. Cabela's extensive product also includes casual and outdoor apparel and footwear, optics, vehicle accessories, gifts and home furnishings with an outdoor theme. In addition, Cabela’s issues the Cabela’s CLUB Visa credit card, which serves as its primary customer loyalty rewards program as a vehicle for strengthening its customer relationships.
shortDescription: Cabela's is an omnichannel retailer of hunting, fishing, camping, shooting sports and related outdoor merchandise

longDescription: Dunelm Group engages in the retail of homewares in the United Kingdom. The Company offers furniture, curtains and blinds, bedding, rugs and decors, and lighting.
shortDescription: Dunelm Group engages in the retail of homewares in the United Kingdom.

longDescription: PriceSmart is engaged in the international operation of membership shopping in warehouse clubs. In addition, the Company operates distribution centers and offices in the United States. The Company's segments include the United States, Central America, the Caribbean and Colombia. The Company owns and operates the United States-style membership shopping warehouse clubs in Latin America and the Caribbean. It offers private label consumer goods to individuals and businesses. PriceSmart offers three types of memberships, such as Business, Diamond and in Costa Rica Platinum memberships.
shortDescription: PriceSmart is the largest operator of membership warehouse clubs in Central America and the Caribbean.

longDescription: Unilever produces and supplies fast moving consumer goods in food, home, and personal care product categories. It operates through Personal Care, Home Care, Foods, and Refreshment segments. The Personal Care segment offers skin care and hair care products, deodorants, and oral care products. The Home Care segment provides home care products, including powders, liquids and capsules, soap bars, and various cleaning products. The Foods segment offers soups, bouillons, sauces, snacks, mayonnaise, salad dressings, and margarines and spreads. The Refreshment segment provides ice creams and tea-based beverages.
shortDescription: Unilever produces and supplies fast moving consumer goods in food, home, and personal care product categories.

longDescription: Fred’s Inc. and subsidiaries operate full-service pharmacy departments. The Company's stores offer a variety of services including prescription and over-the-counter medications, immunizations and healthcare products, in addition to everyday convenience items. This selection includes both national brands and Fred's proprietary brand of lab-tested products. Fred’s also owns and operates two additional chains, Getwell Drug & Dollar and Yazoo Trading Company. Getwell Drug & Dollar is a convenient pharmacy destination that offers an expanded over-the-counter medication selection, and individualized patient care. Yazoo Trading Company offers hardware, auto, and pet and animal supplies.
shortDescription: Fred’s Inc. and subsidiaries operate full-service pharmacy departments.

longDescription: Travis Perkins operates as a builder's merchant and home improvement product retailer. The Company's General Merchanting division supplies building materials for various types of repair, maintenance, and improvement projects, as well as new residential and commercial constructions; the Consumer division supplies domestic building and decorative materials to DIY and trade customers; the Contracts division supplies civils, heavy building materials, and drainage solutions, ceilings, drywall, flooring, insulation, and partitioning and fire protection products, pipeline, heating, mechanical services equipment, and air conditioning and refrigeration equipment.
shortDescription: Travis Perkins operates as a builder's merchant and home improvement product retailer.

longDescription: A. O. Smith Corporation is a company that manufactures and provides residential and commercial water heaters and boilers. The Company offers water heaters for residences, restaurants, hotels and motels, office buildings, laundries, car washes, and small businesses; residential and commercial boilers for use in space heating applications for hospitals, schools, hotels, and other large commercial buildings; and water treatment products.
shortDescription: A. O. Smith Corporation is a company which provides residential and commercial water heaters and boilers.

longDescription: Hasbro operates as a play and entertainment company. It markets and sells action figures, arts and crafts, creative play products, electronic toys and related electronic interactive products, fashion and other dolls, infant products, play sets, preschool toys, plush products, and sports action blasters and accessories, and vehicles and toy-related specialty products, as well as traditional board games, and trading card and role-playing games. The Company is also engaged in consumer products licensing, digital gaming, and movie and television entertainment operations.
shortDescription: Hasbro is a play and entertainment company.

longDescription: Wish is a mobile e-commerce platform that connects small-business owners and consumers. It offers a variety of goods, including clothing, consumer electronics, and accessories.
shortDescription: Wish is a mobile e-commerce platform.

longDescription: IKEA is a multinational group of companies that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture, appliances and home accessories. The Company offers armchairs, bath suites, bean bags, bed linens, beds and bedroom suites, bookcases, boxes, CD storage, ceiling lamps, children's furniture, clocks, coffee tables, cookware, cord management, desk accessories, and dining tables and chairs. It also provides dinnerware, entertainment units, floor lamps, frames, instruments for children, kitchen organizers, kitchen units, leather sofas, lighting, mattresses, mirrors, office chairs and suites, posters, rugs, sofas and more.
shortDescription: IKEA is a multinational group of companies that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture, appliances and home accessories.

longDescription: Ingles Markets, Inc. operates a chain of supermarkets in the Southeast United States. The Company's supermarkets offer customers a wide variety of nationally advertised food products, including grocery, meat, produce, deli and bakery as well as pharmacies, health and beauty care products, and general merchandise. As an adjunct to its supermarket business, Ingles owns and operates shopping centers, gas stations and a milk processing and packaging plant.
shortDescription: Ingles Markets, Inc. is an American regional supermarket chain based in Black Mountain, North Carolina.

longDescription: Smart & Final Stores operates as a food retailer. It operates in two segments, Smart & Final, and Cash & Carry Smart Foodservice. The Company's stores offer fresh perishables and everyday grocery items, such as produce, meat and deli, dairy and cheese, grocery, and beverage products, as well as paper and packaging, and restaurant equipment and janitorial supplies. It also provides various private label products under a number of brands. The Company sells its products to household and business customers, restaurants, caterers, and various other foodservice businesses.
shortDescription: Smart & Final is a chain of warehouse-style food and supply stores.

longDescription: CST Brands is a fuel and convenience retailer. CST operates Corner Store, convenience store locations. Corner Store offers a range of products, such as snack foods, tobacco products, beverages and fresh foods, including its own brands. In addition to convenience store retail sales, CST Brands also sells fuel under a number of licensed energy brands such as Valero, Exxon, Shell, and Phillips 66.
shortDescription: CST Brands is a fuel and convenience retailer.

longDescription: John Lewis is a retailer that operates department stores, home stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores in the U.K. and internationally. The Company’s stores offer home and garden products, including room, furniture, cooking and dining, home furnishing, and home accessories; electrical products, such as sound and vision products, computing and phones, and home and small appliances; clothing and accessories for men and women; make-up and fragrance products, as well as body, skin, and hair care products; and baby and child products. It also sells its products online, as well as serves business-to-business customers. In addition, the Company offers a range of insurance products, including home, car, wedding and event, travel, and pet insurance, as well as life insurance.
shortDescription: John Lewis is a retailer that operates department stores, home stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores.

longDescription: Multi-Color Corporation provides various label solutions. The Сompany offers pressure sensitive labels; in-mold labels; heat transfer labels; shrink sleeve labels; cut and stack glue-applied labels comprising peel-away promotional labels, thermochromics, holographics, and metalized films; and promotional products, such as scratch-off coupons, static-clings, and tags. It also provides graphic and pre-press services; and various print methods consisting of flexographic, lithographic, and rotogravure and digital services. It serves producers of home and personal care, wine and spirit, food and beverage, healthcare, and specialty consumer products, as well as container manufacturers primarily in North, Central, and South Americas, as well as Europe, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, and China.
shortDescription: Multi-Color Corporation provides various label solutions.

longDescription:
The Company offers fashion apparel for women and men, as well as accessories, shoes and home fashions. It operated 278 stores in 29 states as of November 12, 2015. Its typical store is approximately 35,000 gross square feet with a racetrack design, centralized check-out, and individual dressing rooms. The Company’s stores offer a range of services, such as liberal merchandise return policy, merchandise locator service, a Preferred Customer program, co-branded credit card and private label credit card programs, and electronic gift cards.
On November 12, 2015 Stein Mart completed its Fall 2015 store opening program. New stores opened in Coral Springs FL, Lady Lake FL, Brookhaven GA, Newport News VA, Commack NY, Rochester Hills MI, Phoenix AZ, Rancho Mirage CA and Torrance CA. We also relocated our Murrells Inlet SC to South Strand Commons in Myrtle Beach SC.
shortDescription: Stein Mart, Inc. (Stein Mart) is a national retailer offering the fashion merchandise, service and presentation of a department or specialty store.

longDescription: Primo Water provides multi-gallon purified bottled water, self-service refill water and water dispensers. The Company operates through two segments: Primo Water and Primo Dispensers. The Water segment consists of the sale of multi-gallon purified bottled water and its self-service filtered drinking water. The Dispensers segment sells water dispensers that are designed to dispense Primo and other dispenser-compatible bottled water.
shortDescription: Primo Water provides multi-gallon purified bottled water, self-service refill water and water dispensers.

longDescription: Publix operates retail food supermarkets. The Company provides various grocery products, including dairy, bakery, meat, and seafood; health and beauty care, general merchandise, pharmacy, and other products and services.
shortDescription: Publix operates retail food supermarkets.

longDescription: CTI Industries Corporation develops, produces, and sells consumer and film products for commercial and industrial applications worldwide. The Company offers novelty products, including foil and latex balloons, toy balloon products, and other inflatable toy items. It also provides vacuum sealable bags and rolls of film for household storage, valved and resealable bags for vacuum storage use, and vacuum sealing machines. In addition, the Company offers packaging films and custom film products for food, commercial, and packaging applications, and produces and distributes home organization and container products.
shortDescription: CTI Industries Corporation develops, produces, and sells consumer and film products.

longDescription: Launched in 1896 by the popularity of a single product – an oblong piece of chewy, chocolate candy –Tootsie Roll Industries has grown to become one of the country's largest candy companies, with a lineup that includes some of the world's most popular candy, chocolate, and bubble gum brands.
shortDescription: Tootsie Roll Industries is a manufacturer of confectionery in the United States. Its best-known products have been Tootsie Rolls and Tootsie Pops.

longDescription: Altria Group is a producer and marketer of tobacco, cigarettes and related products. The Company's products include smokeable tobacco products comprised of cigarettes and machine-made large cigars and pipe tobacco, smokeless tobacco products, and innovative tobacco products including e-vapor products. In addition, Altria provides a variety of blended table wines and sparkling wines.
shortDescription: Altria Group is a producer and marketer of tobacco, cigarettes and related products.

longDescription: Kimball International is a pre-eminent manufacturer of office and hospitality furniture. The Company sells a portfolio of furniture products and services under three brands, which include Kimball Office, National Office Furniture and Kimball Hospitality. Kimball's portfolio offers solutions for the workplace, learning, healing and hospitality environments.
shortDescription: Kimball International is a pre-eminent manufacturer of office and hospitality furniture.

longDescription: Imperial Brands is a multinational tobacco company manufacturing, marketing and selling tobacco products. The Company's products include cigarettes, cigars, rolling paper and tubes. Its brands include Davidoff, West, Gauloises Blondes, Montecristo, Golden Virginia, Drum and Rizla.
shortDescription: Imperial Brands is a multinational tobacco company manufacturing, marketing and selling tobacco products.

longDescription: Knoll is a manufacturer of commercial and residential furniture, accessories and coverings. The Company designs, manufactures, markets, and sells commercial and residential furniture, accessories, textiles and fine leathers for the workplace and home.
shortDescription: Knoll is a manufacturer of commercial and residential furniture, accessories and coverings.

longDescription: Morrison operates retail supermarkets in the United Kingdom. The Company is involved in in-store and online grocery retailing activities. It also manufactures and distributes fresh food, and morning goods and bread, prepares and supplies seafood, processes fresh meat, invests in, develops, and maintains properties. In addition, it offers insurance and leasing services, as well as holds a pharmaceutical license. Morrison operates through 491 stores, and 334 petrol filling stations.
shortDescription: Morrison operates retail supermarkets in the United Kingdom and is involved in in-store and online grocery retailing activities.

longDescription: The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company provides do-it-yourself lawn, garden, and home protection products. The Company offers consumer fertilizers, plant foods, soils and mulches, pest controls, grass seed and bird food. Its principal consumer brands are Scotts, Miracle-Gro, and Ortho.
shortDescription: The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company provides do-it-yourself lawn, garden, and home protection products.

longDescription: Secret Sales is a free members-only shopping club that conducts online private sales of designer brands. It offers reduced stock from multiple categories including fashion, accessories, homewares, sports equipment, electronics and technology, travel items and tickets, jewellery, watches and children's products.
shortDescription: Secret Sales is a free members-only shopping club that conducts online private sales of designer brands.

longDescription: The Company sells over 27,000 products from over 550 brands and has approximately 1,400 own brand products. The Company offers various products, such as electric guitars, guitar amplifiers, guitar pedals, acoustic guitars, folk instruments, bass guitars, drums and percussion products, such as acoustic drum kits, electronic drums, electronic drum pads and drum hardware, pianos and keyboards, orchestral products, including wind instruments, electric strings, string instruments, brass instruments and accessories, live sound products, such as mixers, public address (PA) systems, microphones and stage lighting, studio gear, disc jockey (DJ) products and home audio products. Gear4music offers products of various third-party brands, such as Yamaha, Roland, Fender, Sonos, Ibanez, Gibson, Korg, Shure, Bach, AKG, Bose, Boss, Corsair, Dbx and Marshall.
shortDescription: Gear4music is a UK-based online retailer of musical instruments and equipment.

longDescription: Crystal Rock markets and distributes water, coffee, office supplies and other home and office refreshment products throughout the Northeast. The Company bottles and distributes natural spring water under the Vermont Pure® brand, purified water with minerals added under the Crystal Rock® Waters label and roasts and packages coffee under its Cool Beans® brand. The majority of its sales are derived from a route distribution system that delivers water in 3- to 5-gallon reusable, recyclable bottles, and coffee in fractional packs or pods.
shortDescription: Crystal Rock markets and distributes water, coffee, office supplies and other home and office refreshment products throughout the Northeast.

longDescription: Topshop Topman is a retailer of women's clothing and accessories. It provides dresses, knitwear, jackets and coats, denims, jeans, trousers, skirts, suits, playsuits, lingerie and nightwear, swimwear, boots, premium shoes, shoe accessories, bags and purses, belts, collars, hats, scarves, as well as jewellery, umbrellas, sunglasses, hair accessories and skin care products. The Company's wide range of apparel and other accessories is sold through its retail stores located all across the United Kingdom and internationally as well as through its website.
shortDescription: Topshop Topman is a retailer of women's clothing and accessories.

longDescription: Tupperware Brands operates as a direct-to-consumer marketer of various products across a range of brands and categories worldwide. The сompany engages in the manufacture and sale of design-centric preparation, storage and serving solutions for the kitchen and home, as well as a line of cookware, knives, microwave products, microfiber textiles, water-filtration related items and an array of products for on-the-go consumers under the Tupperware brand name. It also manufactures and distributes skin and hair care products, cosmetics, bath and body care, toiletries, fragrances, jewelry, and nutritional products under the Avroy Shlain, NaturCare, Nutrimetics, Fuller, BeautiControl, Armand Dupree, Fuller Cosmetics, Del Baul de la Abuela, Natural Forte, Fuller Royal Jelly, Nutri-Rich, NC Express, and Nuvo brands.
shortDescription: Tupperware Brands operates as a direct-to-consumer marketer of various products across a range of brands and categories worldwide.

longDescription: Hanesbrands is a consumer goods company that designs, manufactures, and sells various basic apparel for men, women, and children. The Company operates through four segments: Innerwear, Activewear, Direct to Consumer, and International. It sells bras, panties, shapewear, hosiery, men's underwear, children's underwear, and socks, and other activewear.
shortDescription: Hanesbrands is a consumer goods company that designs, manufactures, sources, and sells various basic apparel for men, women, and children.

longDescription: Libbey is the producer of glass tableware products. The Company's products include glass tableware products and glassware, ceramicware, metalware and other tabletop products. Glass tableware products include products such as tumblers, stemware, mugs, bowls, vases, salt and pepper shakers, shot glasses, canisters, candleholders and other items. Other glass products include storageware, serveware, bakeware, handmade glass tableware and components sold to original equipment manufacturers, such as blender jars, mixing bowls and washing machine windows. Libbey also offers a wide range of ceramic dinnerware products. These include plates, bowls, platters, cups, saucers and other tabletop accessories. In addition, we offer an extensive selection of metal flatware, including knives, forks, spoons and serving utensils, and metal hollowware, which includes such items as serving trays, pitchers, and other metal tabletop accessories.
shortDescription: Libbey Inc. is engaged in the design, production, and sale of tableware and other products.

longDescription: The company set out to be a different kind of mattress retailer; focused on creating a unique shopping experience for the customer with a large selection of quality, brand name bedding products, competitive pricing and knowledgeable, well-trained associates. Over the next several years, Mattress Firm grew to new heights, with the addition of corporate owned and franchise owned stores.Mattress Firm is a subsidiary of Steinhoff International Holding.
shortDescription: The company set out to be a different kind of mattress retailer.

longDescription: The Toronto-Dominion Bank (TD) operating as TD Bank Group is a multinational banking and financial services corporation. TD offers a range of financial products and services through three key business lines: Canadian Retail, U.S. Retail, and Wholesale Banking. Canadian Retail provides a range of financial products and services to customers in the Canadian personal and commercial banking, wealth, and insurance businesses. U.S. Retail comprises the Bank's retail and commercial banking operations operating under the brand TD Bank, auto financing services, and wealth management services in the U.S. Wholesale Banking provides a  range of capital markets, investment banking, and corporate banking products and services, including underwriting and distribution of new debt and equity issues, providing advice on strategic acquisitions and divestitures, and meeting the daily trading, funding, and investment needs of the clients.
shortDescription: The Toronto-Dominion Bank is a multinational banking and financial services corporation.

longDescription: JAKKS Pacific is a multi-line, multi-brand toy company.  The Company designs, produces, markets and distributes toys and related products, pet toys, consumables and related products, electronics and related products, kids indoor and outdoor furniture, and other consumer products. JAKKS Pacific operates through two business segments: traditional toys and electronics, and role play, novelty and seasonal toys. The traditional toys and electronics segment includes action figures, vehicles, playsets, plush products, dolls, accessories, electronic products, construction toys, infant and pre-school toys, foot to floor ride-on vehicles, wagons and pet products and related products; the role play, novelty and seasonal segment includes role play and dress-up products, novelty toys, seasonal and outdoor products, indoor and outdoor kids' furniture and Halloween and everyday costume play.
shortDescription: JAKKS Pacific is a multi-line, multi-brand toy company.

longDescription: H.B. Fuller formulates, manufactures, and markets adhesives, sealants, and other specialty chemical products worldwide. The Company operates through six segments: Americas Adhesives, EIMEA (Europe, India, Middle East and Africa), Asia Pacific, Construction Products, Engineering Adhesives, and Royal Adhesives. It offers a range of specialty adhesives, such as thermoplastic, thermoset, reactive, water-based, and solvent-based products, as well as sealants, coatings, polymers, tapes, encapsulants, and additives. The Company also provides industrial adhesives, grouts, mortars, weather barriers and fungicidal coatings, and block fillers for heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and insulation applications.
shortDescription: H.B. Fuller is a formulator, manufacturer and marketer of adhesives, sealants and other specialty chemical products.

longDescription:
Macfarlane Group PLC operates 3 leading UK based businesses in the packaging and labels sector: 

Macfarlane Packaging Distribution 

We are the UK market leader in the distribution of packaging consumable products to a wide cross-section of companies in the logistics, mail order, internet retail and industrial markets.

Macfarlane Packaging Design and Manufacture

Designs, manufactures and assembles bespoke packaging solutions for UK customers in markets such as electronics, aerospace and medical sectors where they require cost effective protection of high value products in both storage and transit.

Macfarlane Labels

Designs and prints self adhesive and resealable labels for FMCG customers in the UK, Europe and the USA.
shortDescription: Macfarlane Group PLC is a market leading packaging company.

longDescription: Sugarmade is a distributor of tree free paper made from 100% reclaimed sugarcane fiber, enhanced with bamboo. The Company is also a leading producer and wholesaler of custom printed and generic supplies servicing more than 3,000 quick service restaurants. Their products include double poly paper cups for cold beverage; disposable, clear, plastic cold cups, paper coffee cups, yogurt cups, ice cream cups, cup lids, cup sleeves, food containers, soup containers, plastic spoons and many other similar products for this market sector. Sugarmade has become a key supplier to many popular U.S. franchises, particularly in the frozen dessert-related segments.
shortDescription: Sugarmade is a distributor of paper products derived from non-wood sources.

longDescription: Leggett & Platt designs and produces various engineered components and products worldwide. The company operates through four segments: Residential Furnishings, Commercial Products, Industrial Materials, and Specialized Products. The Residential Furnishings segment offers innersprings, wire forms, and machines to shape wire into various types of springs, and geo components. The Commercial Products segment provides molded plywood components, private-label finished furniture and adjustable beds. The Industrial Materials segment offers fabricated wire products, and steel rods. The Specialized Products segment provides mechanical and pneumatic lumbar support and massage systems, and van interiors.
shortDescription: Leggett & Platt is a diversified manufacturing company that designs and produces various engineered components and products.

longDescription: Tandy Leather Factory is a retailer and a wholesale distributor of a range of leather and related products. The Company's products include leather, leather working tools, buckles and adornments for belts, leather dyes and finishes, saddle and tack hardware, and do-it-yourself kits. It also manufactures leather lacing and some of its do-it-yourself kits.
